title: Verify Gameday Mode: Header Player Headshot
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
AND User is in Gameday Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select GAMEDAY option.
AND User Verify Header Player Headshot
custom_expected:
THEN the playback screen moves to the right and a Pitch panel opens on the left with player headshots and player info on the top and Strike zone in the middle. 
AND ON the top left portion user should see Batter/Pitcher Info and Current Pitcher Info
AND the Batter/Pitcher Info should contain Headshot with team primary color background, Position, Jersey Number
AND the Current Pitcher Info should contain Headshot with team primary color background, Position,Jersey Number

title: Verify Gameday Mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
AND User is in Gameday Mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user select GAMEDAY option
custom_expected: THEN the playback screen moves to the right and a Pitch panel opens on the left with player headshots and player info on the top and Strike zone in the middle.

title: Verify Gameday Mode: Strike Zone
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
AND User is in Gameday Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select GAMEDAY option.
AND User see Strike Zone
custom_expected:
THEN the playback screen moves to the right and a Pitch panel opens on the left with player headshots and player info on the top and Strike zone in the middle. 
AND Verify if strikezone map shows how and where each pitch was thrown in relation to the batterâ€™s strikezone 
AND verify 9 zones appear evenly within the strikezone
AND At bat pitches Verify Pitches should appear based on where they were thrown in relation to the strikezone
AND Pitch fields Verify Pitch number, Pitch result color, ball=green, strike=red, in play=blue 
AND Pitch Info Verify Once a new at bat begins, the pitches from the previous at bat should no longer appear

title: Verify Gameday Mode : Pitch By Pitch Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
AND User is in Gameday Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select GAMEDAY option.
AND User Verify Pitch by Pitch feed in strike zone
custom_expected:
THEN the playback screen moves to the right and a Pitch panel opens on the left with player headshots and player info on the top and Pitch by pitch info will shown in the strike zone
And the pitch by pitch feed will display on strike zone and fading when next pitch will thrown

title: Verify Gameday Mode : Most Recent Pitch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
AND User is in Gameday Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select GAMEDAY option.
AND User Verify Most recent Pitch in strike zone
custom_expected:
THEN Verify  Pitcher throw ball and pitch by pitch feed will display on strike zone and fading when next pitch will thrown
AND the Pitch number should display as integer number e.g 1,2,3...
AND the Pitches Result colour should be display as Where ball land if ball = green, strike = red, in play= blue
AND the Pitches Result should ball, strike or inplay
And the Pitch Type should be curve, spin, slider
AND the Current pitch number at-bat
AND the Pitches speed should be in integer with MPH
AND the Pitches speed rate should be displayed in integer
AND the Pitch break should be displayed in degress

title: Verify Gameday Mode : Previous Pitches : Non-Play Events
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
AND User is in Gameday Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select GAMEDAY option.
AND User Verify previous pitches - Non-Play Events
custom_expected:
THEN the Previous Pitch Number should display as integer number e.g 1,2,3...
AND Previous Pitch colour should be display as Where ball land if ball = green, strike = red, in play= blue
AND the Previous Pitch result should ball, strike or inplay
AND the  Previous Pitch speed should be in integer with MPH
AND the Previous pitch type should be displayed

title: Verify Gameday Mode : Previous Pitches : Play Events
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
AND User is in Gameday Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select GAMEDAY option.
AND User Verify Previous Pitches - Play events
custom_expected:
THEN verify Play events should be Hits,Outs or errors
AND the Batter  info have Batter headshot with team primary color background
AND the  Play Results have Font in play result color
AND Play description if swinging etc

title: Verify  CC is unabled when Gameday mode view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
AND User is in Gameday Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select GAMEDAY option.
AND User verify CC
custom_expected: THEN Verify CC is disabled in Gameday mode

title: Verify  User can not FF  Pause or RW when Gameday Mode view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
AND User is in Gameday Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select GAMEDAY option.
AND User Verify FF. Rewind or Pause
custom_expected: Then User can not FF, Rewind or Pause in Gameday mode

title: Verify Gameday mode is availabe on ( Peacock,Apple,Youtube,Tmobile,ESPN) archived feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is entitled for Archived game playback
AND User is in Gameday Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select GAMEDAY option.
AND User and play any Archive feed
custom_expected: Then user should able to see gameday option in all archive game

title: Verify Gameday option will show when gamedayTypes "E" or "P"
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
custom_steps: WHEN the user select game with gamedaTypes "E" or "P"
custom_expected: THEN user should see Gameday Option on top of Playback bar

title: Verify Gameday option will not show when gamedayTypes "N"
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is entitled for Live game playback
custom_steps: WHEN the user select game with gamedaTypes "N"
custom_expected: THEN user should NOT see Gameday Option on top of Playback bar
